Hey

I am Dr De Stress

Making hospitals safe and happy places to work.

Stress costs.

Both in money and in personal health.

Do you know how your staff are feeling? Hospitals are stressful environments.

But there are scientifically-proven methods to ensure your most precious resource, your staff, are not suffering unduly. Let Dr De Stress help you help your staff.
